jcr:content.jcr:title: List of people associated with the California Gold Rush

contentheadline.headline: List of people associated with the California Gold Rush

contentrichtext.text: People listed here should be known to have been in [[Northern California]] during the period from 1848 to 1855. :''See also [[:Category:People of the California Gold Rush]]'' *[[James "Grizzly" Adams]] *[[Charles H. Bennett (soldier)|Charles H. Bennett]], present at the first discovery of gold. *[[Henry Bigler]], one of the first people to note the discovery of gold at [[Sutter's Mill]] *[[Samuel Brannan]] *[[Frederick Catherwood]] *[[Jean Baptiste Charbonneau]] *[[Charles Crocker]] *[[Alonzo Delano]] *[[Charles S. Fairfax]] *[[Thomas Fallon]] *[[Joseph Libbey Folsom]] *[[John C. Frémont]] *[[John White Geary]] *[[Domingo Ghirardelli]] *[[Daniel Govan]] *[[Ulysses Grant]] *[[O. C. Hackett]] *[[Albert W. Hicks]] *[[John Wesley Hillman]] *[[Sherman Otis Houghton]] *[[William B. Ide]] *[[Frank James]] *[[Seth Kinman]] *[[James Lick]] *[[Heinrich Lienhard]] *[[James W. Marshall|James Marshall]], discoverer of the first gold *[[Richard Barnes Mason]] *[[John Templeton McCarty]] *[[James McClatchy]] *[[Ross McCloud]] *[[Benjamin McCulloch]] *[[George McKnight]], discovered gold at [[Gold Hill (Nevada County, California)|Gold Hill]] near [[Grass Valley, California]] in 1850 *[[Joaquin Miller]] *[[Joaquin Murietta]] *[[Isaac Murphy]] *[[Joshua Norton]], a.k.a. His Imperial Majesty Norton I, [[Emperor]] of the [[United States]] and Protector of [[Mexico]] *[[Lester Allan Pelton]] Inventor of the "Pelton Runner" - Considered to be the "Father of Hydroelectric Power" *[[Addison Pratt]] *[[Benjamin B. Redding]] *[[Charles E Sexey]] *[[William Tecumseh Sherman]] *[[Claus Spreckels]] *[[Stephen Staats]], nearby at the first discovery of gold. *[[Leland Stanford]] *[[Elijah Steele]] *[[Levi Strauss]] *[[John Sutter]] *[[Matthew Turner]] *[[Mark Twain]] *[[Maríano Guadalupe Vallejo]] *[[William Waldo (California politician)|William Waldo]] *[[Bela Wellman]] *[[Edwin B. Winans (politician)|Edwin B. Winans]] [[Category:People of the California Gold Rush|*]] [[Category:Lists of people from California|Gold Rush]] [[Category:19th-century American businesspeople|California Gold Rush]] [[Category:San Francisco Bay Area-related lists|Gold]]
